concept.title: Managing Framework Configuration Summary
concept.abstract: System Administrators configure the Framework services to maintain the system and initiate troubleshooting.

conbody.p: Click Configuration Summary in the Spark Framework app to return the Framework Configurations. Admin users have two options:

ol.li: Reset Configurations-Click the Reset Configurations button to clear data from all Registered Apps, Registered Objects, Routing Rules, Custom Scripts, Rollup Summary Fields, and Settings Pages. Best use case occurs when the Admin is attempting to refresh their Sandbox environment and the configurations are not correctly copied from the Production environment; Reset Configurations for a fresh start.
Run Install Scripts-Click the Run Install Scripts button when a new Salesforce environment is created in order to insert new records.
Run Jobs - Click Run on the related Custom Script to manually run the job.
